import React from "react"; import "./History.css"; import "./Card.css"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Cookies from "universal-cookie"; import { BiDetail } from "react-icons/bi"; import { dateFormater, addDays } from "./Functions/functions"; import { Table, Row, Col, Modal, Button, Badge } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; const History = () => { const [history, setHistory] = useState([]); const [orderSelected, setOrderSelected] = useState([]); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); let historyUrl = useHistory(); const getHistory = () => { fetch("http://localhost:4000/getHistory") .then((res) => res.json()) .then((json) => { console.log(json); setHistory(json); }); }; useEffect(() => { getHistory(); }, []); return (
